solidbase.core
Class Database

java.lang.Object
  solidbase.core.Database

public class Database
extends Object

Manages connections to the database.

Since:
Apr 1, 2006 7:16:37 PM

Constructor Detail

Database

public Database(String name,
                String driverClassName,
                String url,
                String defaultUser,
                String defaultPassword,
                ProgressListener callBack)
Constructor for a specific database and default user. This object will manage multiple connections to this database.

Parameters:
name - The name of the database.
driverClassName - Driver class name for the database.
url - URL for the database.
defaultUser - The default user name.
defaultPassword - The password belonging to the default user.
callBack - The progress listener.
Method Detail

init

public void init()
Resets the current user and initializes the connection if a password is known.

getName

public String getName()
Returns the name of this database.

Returns:
The name of this database.

getCurrentUser

public String getCurrentUser()
Returns the current user.

Returns:
The current user.

setConnectionListener

public void setConnectionListener(ConnectionListener connectionListener)
Sets the connection listener that listens to connection events.

Parameters:
connectionListener - The connection listener.

getConnection

protected static Connection getConnection(String url,
                                          String user,
                                          String password)
Returns a new connection for the given URL, user name and password. The connection has auto commit disabled.

Parameters:
url - URL for the database.
user - The user name.
password - The password of the user.
Returns:
A new connection with auto commit disabled.

getConnection

public Connection getConnection()
Returns a connection for the current user. Connections are cached per user. If a connection for the current user is not found in the cache, a password will be requested by calling ProgressListener.requestPassword(String) referenced by CommandProcessor.progress.

Returns:
The connection for the current user.

setCurrentUser

protected void setCurrentUser(String user)
Sets the current user.

Parameters:
user - The user name that should made current.

getDefaultUser

public String getDefaultUser()
Return the default user.

Returns:
The name of the default user.

closeConnections

protected void closeConnections()
Close all open connections that are maintained by this instance of Database.
